TextBody:
Mathieu - Thank you for providing the additional information. Based on the files that you shared, it looks like you do not have the required version of .Net framework installed. For your assistance, I am pasting the link for the requirements here: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/PingCastle_3.3_BasicUser/page/Requirements.html#navPoint_4

Please visit the link and install the required version of .Net framework and make sure you are running the installation file with administrator account. There also a link to Microsoft knowledge base with the above shared url to help you with the installation of .Net framework.

Should you have any other questions and concerns, please feel free to reach out.

Kind Regards,
Shaheryar Ali

Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Corporation

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NBh7g:ref

Hello Ali,

Thank you for your answer and sorry for my late feedback.

After installing the 3.5 framework everything was working fine.

Can I ask you something else please ? 
I configured the IIS server to use HTTPS secure access but I don't feel at ease with certificates.

When I try to run the command I would like to implement in the scheduler, I have an SSL error : Login failed (The underlying connection was closed: Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel.)
I attach screenshot to show you : SSL_error

Do you know which process I could follow to resolve this ? 

Many thanks.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #439650 - Error message during database creation

Thank you.
